Reference Index¶

class my_aquarium.tank.Tank(*, aquarium_type='freshwater', ph=7, temperature=30)¶

My Aquarium.

Fish and shrimps can live in it. The aquarium can be a freshwater or saltwater aquarium.

We can adjust PH and temperature up or down.

check_inhabitant_compatibility()¶

Check if this fish will be compatible with the current tank inhabitants.

stock_down(inhabitant, quantity)¶

Take out some fish or shrimp from the tank.

stock_up(inhabitant, quantity)¶

Add more fish or shrimp to the tank.

Parameters:

  • inhabitant – The type of inhabitant, either shrimp of fish

  • quantity – The number of fish or shrimp to be added

Raises:

TankIsFullError – if the tank is already full
